entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:27 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023
